name: Create an H2H SFTP job with Dual Authentication.txt - Test your job
description: This section explains how to test and configure a job for transferring files between an SFTP server and an S3 bucket using dual authentication (password and private key). It provides instructions for adding the job configuration, storing the password and passphrase securely, deploying the job, and testing it using API calls.
use_cases: Transferring files from an SFTP server to an S3 bucket (pull job)
Transferring files from an S3 bucket to an SFTP server (push job)
Securely storing and managing credentials (password and passphrase) for SFTP servers
Automating file transfers between SFTP servers and S3 buckets
capabilities: Dual authentication (password and private key) for SFTP servers
Configuration management for SFTP and S3 settings
API endpoints for triggering and testing file transfer jobs
Support for both pull (SFTP to S3) and push (S3 to SFTP) jobs
Deployment and testing in different environments (stage and production)
